wikipedia_page.main: John Edward Jones (December 5, 1840 – April 10, 1896) was an American politician. He was the eighth Governor of Nevada. He was a member of the Silver Party.

response: In the 1894 midterm elections, the Silver Party remained a Nevada party. It swept all statewide offices, formerly held by Republicans. John Edward Jones was elected Governor with 50% of the vote; Newlands was re-elected with 44%.
*John Edward Jones – American politician and the eighth Governor of Nevada
*John Edward Jones (governor) (1840–1896), Welsh-born Governor of Nevada
*John Edward Jones (Welsh politician) (1905–1970), Welsh political organiser
*John Edward Jones (died 2009), caver who died in the Nutty Putty Cave
